text: it was a scene perhaps more fitting for a galaxy far , far away , . but the force was strong this weekend as star wars fanatics russell ellis and paloma mota , of knoxville , tied the knot - dressed in full sci-fi fancy dress . the couple - who met a year ago - decided they did not want ` anything traditional ' for their big day and struck upon the idea for the intergalactic themed wedding . paloma mota , right , waits to be escorted down the aisle by steve rifenberick , who is costumed as darth maul , and a group of stormtroopers during her star wars themed wedding . ms mota dressed as princess leia , centre , and russell lynn ellis , second from right , are congratulated by darth maul immediately after their star wars themed ceremony . the couple - who met a year ago - decided they did not want ` anything traditional ' for their big day and struck upon the idea for the intergalactic themed wedding . mr ellis told the knoxville news : ` she said ,  we should have a star . wars wedding . but i want a small star wars wedding  . there 's no such . thing . this is going to be fun . ' more than 30 guests entered the spirit of the day with a role in the ceremony , with stormtroopers ushering guests to their seats , and the bride - dressed as princess leia - escorted down the aisle by a fearsome looking darth maul . bob punch , dressed as star wars character emperor palpatine waits for the start of the ceremony . darth maul quenches his thirst as he inspects a trio of stormtroopers . more than 30 guests entered the spirit of the day with a role in the ceremony . alex mckeel , right , dressed as a star wars snow trooper , ushers david russell , left , and barbara russell - who appear to be dressed in normal clothes - to their seats . a working r2-d2 robot carried the ring , which according to groom mr ellis - dressed of course as luke skywalker - cost almost as much as the death star . the ceremony , which included vows read from a seven page script , took place at gatlinburg lodge , tennessee .
